00062 template <class Alloc = std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool Threadsafe = true,
00063     bool Secure = false>
00064 class nothrow_integer_t: public detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00065     Secure>, public any_integer
00066 {
00067     public:
00068     typedef nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> type;
00069 
00072     nothrow_integer_t();
00073     nothrow_integer_t(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b);
00074     nothrow_integer_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) b): any_integer(*this, 1) {
00075         _swap(b); }
00076     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const char *str, size_t base = 10);
00077     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base =
00078         10);
00079     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const std::string& str, size_t base = 10);
00080     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0);
00081     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const any_integer& other);
00082     template <typename Type> nothrow_integer_t(const Type n,
00083         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type* = 0);
00084 
00085     #ifndef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00086 
00087     nothrow_integer_t(const detail::data_t c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc,
00088         Threadsafe, Secure>(*c.holder()), any_integer(*this, c.length,
00089         c.negative) { data.beginendmod(); }
00090     nothrow_integer_t(const detail::nan_t& c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc,
00091         Threadsafe, Secure>(0), any_integer(*this, 0) { }
00092     #endif

00100     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(
00101         BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c);
00102     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(
00103         BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) c) { _swap(c); return *this; }
00104     template <typename Type> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>&
00105         operator=(const Type n) { nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00106         Secure> nn(n); _swap(nn); return *this; }

00168     static nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nan() { return _nan; }
00169     template <class Type> static nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
00170         random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on = false,
00171         bool low_bit_on = false, bool can_be_negative = false);
00172     template <class Type> static nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>

00174         no_callback);
00176 
00177     void _swap(nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& s) { using
00178         std::swap; swap(data, s.data); }
00179     static std::string _nan_text() { return "#NaN#"; }
00180 
00181     private:
00182     static nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> _nan;
00183     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)
00184 };

00186 template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00187 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00188     Threadsafe, Secure>::_nan = nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(
00189     detail::nan_t());

00195 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00196 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t():
00197     any_integer(*this, 1)
00198 {
00199     // Don't need to do anything, already preinitialized to zero.
00200 }
00201 
00203 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00204 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const
00205     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b): any_integer(*this, 1)
00206 {
00207     try {
00208         data = b.data;
00209         if (!is_nan()) data.beginendmod();
00210     } catch (std::exception&) {
00211         *this = nan();
00212     }
00213 }
00214 
00216 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00217 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const char *str,
00218     size_t base): any_integer(*this, 1)
00219 {
00220     try {
00221         data.from_string(str, strlen(str), base);
00222     } catch (std::exception&) {
00223         *this = nan();
00224     }
00225 }

00252 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00253 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const
00254     xint::binary_t b, size_t bits): any_integer(*this, 1)
00255 {
00256     try {
00257         data.from_binary(b, bits);
00258     } catch (std::exception&) {
00259         *this = nan();
00260     }

00262 
00264 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00265 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const
00266     any_integer& c): any_integer(*this, 1)
00267 {
00268     if (c._data().is_nan()) {
00269         *this = nan();
00270     } else {
00271         try {
00272             data.duplicate_data(c._data());
00273         } catch (std::exception&) {
00274             *this = nan();
00275         }
00276     }
00277 }
00278 
00291 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00292 template <typename Type> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00293     Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const Type n, typename
00294     boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*): any_integer(*this, 1)
00295 {
00296     try {
00297         if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00298         else data.set_unsigned(n);
00299     } catch (std::exception&) {
00300         *this = nan();
00301     }
00302 }
00303 
00304 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00305 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00306     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00307 {
00308     try {
00309         data = c.data;
00310         if (!is_nan()) data.beginendmod();
00311     } catch (std::exception&) {
00312         *this = nan();
00313     }
00314     return *this;
00315 }
00316 
00318 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00319 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00320     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator-() const
00321 {
00322     try {
00323         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00324         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(-data);
00325         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00326     } catch (std::exception&) {
00327         return nan();
00328     }
00329 }

00332 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00333 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00334     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator+=(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00335     Secure> b)
00336 {
00337     try {
00338         if (!is_nan() && !b.is_nan()) data += b.data;
00339         else *this = nan();
00340     } catch (std::exception&) {
00341         *this = nan();
00342     }
00343     return *this;
00344 }

00563 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00564 bool nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::is_odd() const {
00565     try {
00566         return (is_nan() ? false : data.is_odd());
00567     } catch (std::exception&) {
00568         return false;
00569     }
00570 }

00579         return (is_nan() ? false : data.is_even());

00581         return false;
00582     }

00594         return (is_nan() ? 0 : data.sign(signed_zero));

00596         return 0;

00614 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00615 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00616     Threadsafe, Secure>::pow2(size_t exponent)
00617 {
00618     try {
00619         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00620         detail::pow2(r.data, exponent);
00621         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00622     } catch (std::exception&) {
00623         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();
00624     }
00625 }

00628 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00629 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00630     Threadsafe, Secure>::factorial(size_t n)
00631 {
00632     try {
00633         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00634         detail::factorial(r.data, n);
00635         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00636     } catch (std::exception&) {
00637         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();
00638     }

00642 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00643 template <class Type>
00644 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00645     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool
00646     high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00647 {
00648     try {
00649         detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00650 
00651         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00652         detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00653             low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00654         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00655     } catch (std::exception&) {
00656         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();
00657     }
00658 }

00661 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00662 template <class Type>
00663 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00664     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_prime(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t
00665     callback)
00666 {
00667     try {
00668         detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00669 
00670         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00671         detail::random_prime(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, callback);
00672         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00673     } catch (std::exception&) {
00674         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();
00675     }
00676 }

00683 
00685 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00686 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> abs(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00687     Threadsafe, Secure> n)
00688 {
00689     try {
00690         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00691         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(abs(n._data()));
00692         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00693     } catch (std::exception&) {
00694         return n.nan();
00695     }
00696 }
00697 
00702 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00703 typename nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t divide(const
00704     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> dividend, const
00705     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> divisor)
00706 {
00707     try {
00708         if (dividend.is_nan() || divisor.is_nan())
00709             return std::make_pair(dividend.nan(), dividend.nan());
00710         typename nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t r;
00711         divide(r.quotient._data(), r.remainder._data(), dividend._data(),
00712             divisor._data());
00713         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00714     } catch (std::exception&) {
00715         return std::make_pair(dividend.nan(), dividend.nan());
00716     }
00717 }
00719 
00722 
00724 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00725 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> square(const nothrow_integer_t<
00726     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n)
00727 {
00728     try {
00729         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00730         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00731         square(r._data(), n._data());
00732         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00733     } catch (std::exception&) {
00734         return n.nan();
00735     }
00736 }

00739 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00740 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> pow(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00741     Threadsafe, Secure> n, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> e)
00742 {
00743     try {
00744         if (n.is_nan() || e.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00745         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00746         pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
00747         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00748     } catch (std::exception&) {
00749         return n.nan();
00750     }
00751 }

00754 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00755 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> sqrt(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00756     Threadsafe, Secure> n)
00757 {
00758     try {
00759         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00760         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00761         sqrt(r._data(), n._data());
00762         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00763     } catch (std::exception&) {
00764         return n.nan();
00765     }
00766 }

00777 Type to(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n) {
00778     try {
00779         if (n.is_nan()) return Type(0);
00780         return to<Type>(n._data());
00781     } catch (std::exception&) {
00782         return Type(0);
00783     }

00790 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00791 std::string to_string(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n,
00792     size_t base = 10, bool uppercase = false)
00793 {
00794     try {
00795         if (n.is_nan()) return n._nan_text();
00796         return to_string(n._data(), base, uppercase);
00797     } catch (std::exception&) {
00798         return std::string();
00799     }
00800 }

00813         return to_binary(n._data(), bits);

00900 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00901 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> mulmod(const nothrow_integer_t<
00902     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00903     Secure> by, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> modulus)
00904 {
00905     try {
00906         if (n.is_nan() || by.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00907         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00908         mulmod(r._data(), n._data(), by._data(), modulus._data());
00909         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00910     } catch (std::exception&) {
00911         return n.nan();
00912     }
00913 }

00934     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,

00974 int is_prime(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n, callback_t
00975     callback = no_callback)
00976 {
00977     try {
00978         if (n.is_nan()) return -2;
00979         return is_prime(n._data(), callback);

00981         return -2;

00997         return false;

01066 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01067 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> operator+(const nothrow_integer_t<
01068     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
01069     Secure> n2)
01070 {
01071     if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01072     try {
01073         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(n1._data() + n2._data());
01074         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01075     } catch (std::exception&) {
01076         return n1.nan();
01077     }

01191 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01192 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> gcd(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
01193     Threadsafe, Secure> num1, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01194     num2)
01195 {
01196     if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return num1.nan();
01197     try {
01198         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
01199         gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
01200         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01201     } catch (std::exception&) {
01202         return num1.nan();
01203     }
01204 }

01207 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01208 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> lcm(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
01209     Threadsafe, Secure> num1, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01210     num2)
01211 {
01212     if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return num1.nan();
01213     try {
01214         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
01215         lcm(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
01216         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01217     } catch (std::exception&) {
01218         return num1.nan();
01219     }
01220 }

01226 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01227 int compare(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const
01228     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2, bool ignoresign = false)
01229 {
01230     if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return 2;
01231     try {
01232         return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
01233     } catch (std::exception&) {
01234         return 2;
01235     }
01236 }
01237 
01242 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01243 size_t log2(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n) {
01244     try {
01245         return (n.is_nan() ? 0 : log2(n._data()));
01246     } catch (std::exception&) {
01247         return 0;
01248     }
01249 }
01251 
01254 #define BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
01255     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01256     rtype op(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N \
01257         n2) \
01258     { \
01259         return op(n1, nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2)); \
01260     } \
01261     \
01262     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01263     rtype op(const N n1, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> \
01264         n2) \
01265     { \
01266         return op(nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2); \
01267     }
01268 
01269 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<)
01270 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>)
01271 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=)
01272 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=)
01273 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==)
01274 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=)
01275 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare)
01276 
01279 #define BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(op) \
01280     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01281     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const nothrow_integer_t< \
01282         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N n2) \
01283     { \
01284         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(n1, \
01285             nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2))); \
01286         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01287     } \
01288     \
01289     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01290     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const N n1, const \
01291         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2) \
01292     { \
01293         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(nothrow_integer_t< \
01294             Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2)); \
01295         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01296     }
01297 
01298 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(pow)
01299 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(mulmod)
01300 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(sqrmod)
01301 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(powmod)
01302 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(invmod)
01303 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator+)
01304 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator-)
01305 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator*)
01306 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator/)
01307 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator%)
01308 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator&)
01309 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator|)
01310 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator^)
01311 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(gcd)
01312 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(lcm)
01313 
01316 template <typename charT, typename traits, class Alloc, bool
01317     Threadsafe, bool Secure> inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>&
01318     operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& out, const nothrow_integer_t<
01319     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n)
01320 {
01321     if (n.is_nan()) return operator<<(out, n._nan_text());
01322     return operator<<(out, n._data());
01323 }
01324 
01325 template <typename charT, typename traits, class Alloc, bool
01326     Threadsafe, bool Secure> inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>&
01327     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& in, nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
01328     Threadsafe, Secure>& n)
01329 {
01330     if (in.peek()=='#') {
01331         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
01332         char buffer[6];
01333 
01334         // These are efficient and safe, but MSVC complains about them anyway.
01335         //std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
01336         //buffer[size]=0;
01337 
01338         // Replacing them with these.
01339         char *p = buffer, *pe = p + 5;
01340         while (p != pe) in >> *p++;
01341         *p = 0;
01342 
01343         std::string str(buffer);
01344 
01345         if (str == n._nan_text()) n = n.nan();
01346         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
01347         return in;
01348     } else {
01349         return operator>>(in, n._data());
01350     }
01351 }
01353 
01354 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01355 inline void swap(nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& left,
01356     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& right)
01357 {
01358     left._swap(right);
01359 }
01360 
01365 typedef nothrow_integer_t<> nothrow_integer;

01367 } // namespace xint
